title: typo blogs
content:
well everyone has a website but list he blogs.

I use to think it was a girl thing.

mine is  
 [http://vinceconnare.wordpress.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071217100632/http:/vinceconnare.wordpress.com/ "http://vinceconnare.wordpress.com/")

don’t take it too seriously It’s more or a phlog that a blog..

Zara’s it here\>  
 [http://www.commandzed.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071217100632/http:/www.commandzed.com/ "http://www.commandzed.com/")

Thomas Phinney  
 [http://blogs.adobe.com/typblography/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071217100632/http:/blogs.adobe.com/typblography/ "http://blogs.adobe.com/typblography/")

SpiekerBlog  
 [http://www.spiekermann.com/iblog/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071217100632/http:/www.spiekermann.com/iblog/index.html "http://www.spiekermann.com/iblog/index.html")

who’s going to write the blogging list?

 [‹ Typographic Political Cartoon](http://web.archive.org/web/20071217100632/http:/typophile.com/node/30158 "Go to previous forum topic") [Just in time for the New Year. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071217100632/http:/typophile.com/node/30165 "Go to next forum topic")
author: vinceconnare

comments.content: I don’t talk about type on my blog: maybe I should start? ;-)

Mine’s here, although I haven’t been posting much lately:

[http://www.marksimonson.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071217100632/http:/www.marksimonson.com/ "http://www.marksimonson.com/")

[http://blog.myspace.com/chozcunningham](http://web.archive.org/web/20071217100632/http:/blog.myspace.com/chozcunningham "http://blog.myspace.com/chozcunningham")

Type sometimes, or art, or whatever I happen to poke into.
